title: Marine hull & machinery insurance policies
dataVerified: Vessel owner, vessel IMO number, hull value, coverage terms, classification society
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake marine hull insurance. Domain binding verifies Lloyd's syndicate/marine insurer. Very high hull values ($10M-$500M+ for commercial vessels). International maritime law compliance. Ship mortgage lender verification. Multi-page: Hull policies multi-page contracts.
